product_name: Life is good French Terry Sleep Pants - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The Life is good(R) French Terry Sleep pants are made of rich French Terry fabric for warmth and comfort while you sleep or lounge around the house. Cotton/polyester blend fabric has a touch of spandex to ensure pants move with you; fabric is washed for softness. Wide, contoured rib-knit waistband offers a flattering fit. Closeout.
short_description: The Life is good(R) French Terry Sleep pants are made of rich French Terry fabric for warmth and comfort while you sleep or lounge around the house.
